character varying(200) */ ,tot_empl_cnt /* tot_empl_cnt 총_종업원_수 numeric */ ,hoffice_empl_cnt /* hoffice_empl_cnt 본사_종업원_수 numeric */ ,fact_clrk_empl_cnt /* fact_clrk_empl_cnt 공장_사무직_종업원_수 numeric */ ,fact_saljb_empl_cnt /* fact_saljb_empl_cnt 공장_판매직_종업원_수 numeric */ ,fact_prdj_empl_cnt /* fact_prdj_empl_cnt 공장_생산직_종업원_수 numeric */ ,build_posse_div_nm /* build_posse_div_nm 건물_소유_구분_명 character varying(100) */ ,grnt_amt /* grnt_amt 보증_금액 numeric */ ,mrent_amt /* mrent_amt 월세_금액 numeric */ ,multi_use_busi_yn /* multi_use_busi_yn 다중_이용_업소_여부 character varying(1) */ ,fclty_tot_scal /* fclty_tot_scal 시설_총_규모 numeric */ ,trdtn_busi_apnt_no /* trdtn_busi_apnt_no 전통_업소_지정_번호 character varying(40) */ ,trdtn_busi_main_food /* trdtn_busi_main_food 전통_업소_주된_음식 character varying(20) */ ,hpge /* hpge 홈페이지 character varying(200) */ ,loc_no /* loc_no 위치_번호 numeric */ ,del_yn /* del_yn 삭제_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_dzone_data_07 WHERE 1 = 1 AND job_dt = #{jobDt} /* job_dt 작업_일자 character(8) */ AND seq = #{seq} /* seq 순번 numeric */
